item.title: Enhancing Diversity in Bayesian Deep Learning via Hyperspherical Energy Minimization of CKA
item.description: Boosting Bayesian deep learning’s diversity and uncertainty quantification, this study proposes hyperspherical energy minimization of CKA to generate diverse and reliable neural network ensembles and …

item.description: Crowd wisdom solves noisy label learning!
